guidanceTitle: Subvention salariale temporaire de 10 % pour les employeurs
guidanceText: Le gouvernement fédéral a fourni une nouvelle subvention salariale temporaire (SST) aux employeurs admissibles pour la période du 18 mars 2020 au 19 juin 2020, en raison de la pandémie du COVID-19 .

guidanceTitle: La subvention salariale d’urgence du Canada (SSUC)​
guidanceText: Le gouvernement fédéral a proposé un programme de soutien pour aider les employeurs à maintenir leurs travailleurs en poste et à les reprendre lorsqu’ils ont dû les mettre à pied, et éviter les licenciements, en raison de la pandémie du COVID-19.

guidanceTitle: L’Agence du revenue du Canada (ARC) - Dispositions d'allègement - Dates d’échéance prolongées pour la production des déclarations de revenus et paiements​
guidanceText: L’ARC a accordé un certain répit aux contribuables et préparateurs d’autres déclarations de renseignements en prolongeant les dates d’échéance, afin de donner plus de temps pour compléter les déclarations et effectuer les paiements, en raison de la pandémie du COVID-19.

guidanceTitle: L’Agence du revenu du Canada (ARC) - Report des versements de la taxe de vente (TPS/TVH) et paiements des droits de douane.
guidanceText: En raison de la pandémie du COVID-19, l’ARC accorde un certain répit aux entreprises, y compris les travailleurs autonomes à reporter leurs versements de TPS/TVH ou paiements des droits de douane sur leurs importations.

guidanceTitle: Compte d’urgence pour les entreprises canadiennes​
guidanceText: Un nouveau programme fédéral qui contribute à couvrir les coûts d’exploitation des petites entreprises et organismes à but non lucrative qui font face à des réductions de revenus temporaires.

guidanceTitle: Mesures spéciales temporaires du travail partagé pour soutenir les employeurs et travailleurs touchés par le COVID-19
guidanceText: Des mesures spéciales pour soutenir les employeurs et travailleurs dans le programme de travail partagé.

guidanceTitle: Prêts supplémentaires aux producteurs, agroentreprises et industries alimentaires​
guidanceText: Hausse de crédit offert aux producteurs, agroentreprises et industries alimentaires.

guidanceTitle: Loyers de baux fonciers en suspens pour le secteur du transport aérien
guidanceText: Une mesure de soutien pour les administrations aéroportuaires en renonçant aux loyers de baux fonciers jusqu’à la fin de 2020.

guidanceTitle: Droits de licence de la partie I annulés pour les radiodiffuseurs
guidanceText: Une mesure de soutien pour aider les radiodiffuseurs à faire face aux retombées du COVID-19.

guidanceTitle: Programme de crédit aux entreprises (PCE)
guidanceText: Le Gouvernement du Canada a instauré un programme afin d’offrir 40 milliards de dollars en soutien supplémentaire par l’entremise de la Banque de développement du Canada (BDC) et d’Exportation et développement Canada (EDC).

guidanceTitle: Alberta - Extended Due Dates for Corporate Income Tax Return (AT1) and Payment Deferral
guidanceText: The Alberta government has provided some relief to Alberta corporate taxpayers by extending due dates to provide more time to file and pay as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: Alberta - Education Property Tax Freeze and Deferral for Business
guidanceText: The Alberta government has provided some relief to Alberta businesses who pay education property tax by freezing the rate and deferring the collection of the tax.

guidanceTitle: Alberta - Deferral of Tourism Levy Remittances
guidanceText: The Alberta government has provided some tax relief for the tourism industry by deferring the tourism levy in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: Alberta - WCB Premium Relief for Employers
guidanceText: The Alberta government has provided relief to private sector employers by deferring 2020 WCB premiums and by waiving 50% of the WCB premium for those employed in small- and medium-sized businesses as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: B.C. - Extended Due Dates for Employer Health Tax (EHT) Filing and Payments
guidanceText: The deadline of EHT filing and payments has been deferred as part of BC's COVID-19 action plan.

guidanceTitle: B.C. - Extended Due Dates for BC Sales Taxes Filing and Payments
guidanceText: The filing and payment due dates for selected sales taxes are extended as part of BC’s COVID-19 action plan.

guidanceTitle: B.C. - Delay in PST and Carbon Tax Changes
guidanceText: The B.C. government has provided some relief to taxpayers and filers of PST and Carbon tax information returns by postponing some PST and Carbon tax changes.

guidanceTitle: B.C. - Reduced School Tax Rates for Businesses
guidanceText: The B.C. government has provided some relief to business taxpayers who pay school property tax on commercial properties by reducing the rate by 50% in response to COVID-19.

guidanceTitle: B.C. - Deferral of WorkSafeBC Premium Reporting and Payments
guidanceText: WorkSafeBC is providing some relief to employers by postponing payment deadlines for WorkSafeBC premiums in response to COVID-19.

guidanceTitle: Manitoba Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: ​New Brunswick Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Newfoundland and Labrador Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Nova Scotia Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Ontario - Employer Health Tax (EHT) Exemption Increase for 2020
guidanceText: The Ontario government is retroactively raising the Employer Health Tax (EHT) exemption to provide tax relief for businesses as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: Ontario – 5-Month Relief Period for Employer Health Tax (EHT) and Other Provincial Taxes
guidanceText: The Ontario government has provided a 5-month interest and penalty relief for Ontario businesses for some provincial taxes as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: Ontario - Deferral of WSIB Premium Reporting and Payments
guidanceText: WSIB Ontario is providing some relief to employers by deferring WSIB premium reporting and payments in response to COVID-19.

guidanceTitle: Prince Edward Island Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Québec - Deferral of Tax Reporting and Payments
guidanceText: The Québec government has provided some relief to Québec taxpayers by extending due dates to provide more time to file and pay as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: Québec - 6-month Moratorium on Loan Repayments to La Financière agricole du Québec (FADQ)
guidanceText: La Financière agricole du Québec (FADQ) is implementing measures to support agricultural producers by offering a six-month moratorium on loan repayments and by extending the enrolment date and the notices of assessment for their Crop Insurance Program.

guidanceTitle: Québec - Emergency Funding for Small and Medium Companies (up to $50,000)​
guidanceText: The Québec government is offering emergency loans for businesses who are experiencing financial difficulties during the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: Québec - Investissement Québec - Loan or Loan Guarantee ($50,000 or greater)​
guidanceText: A new Québec government program that helps businesses and non-profits experiencing temporary cash flow issues.

guidanceTitle: Québec - Programme actions concertées pour le maintien en emploi (PACME–COVID-19)
guidanceText: The Québec government is offering direct financial support to businesses to promote workforce skills training and human resource management.

guidanceTitle: Québec - Financial Help for the Maintenance of Essential Regional Air Services​
guidanceText: A financial assistance program for the provision of essential regional air services during the COVID-19 health emergency by subsidizing operating deficits.

guidanceTitle: Québec - CNESST flexibility measures
guidanceText: CNESST financial relief package for Québec businesses.

guidanceTitle: Saskatchewan Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Northwest Territories Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Nunavut Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.

guidanceTitle: Yukon Programs
guidanceText: Immediate support measures to help businesses maintain their normal business operations.
